description: For Rocco Russo and Silas O'Hara, the normally mundane task of picking up a car from the mechanic is about to get a lot more interesting. Johnny Torque is pretty good with a wrench, but to truly appreciate his capabilities, he needs to really get inside what he's working on, poke around and prod at it from the inside. Silas understands this, and Rocco learns soon enough, as Johnny unzips his cover-alls to reveal a rock hard rod that's ready to be tested. Johnny dips his stick into Silas as Rocco shoves his cock in Silas' mouth. It's a frenzied free-for-all as the guys switch positions, with Silas pounding Rocco as Johnny looks on approvingly, before he takes Silas for one final hard drivin' spin, before all three guys shoot their loads on Silas' waiting, sweating body. Test drive completed, Johnny sends another customer away completely satisfied.Enjoy!
series: NDB - 4505 - Johnny Torque, Rocco Russo and Silas O'Hara
title: Broken Down Wheels
